SEARCH
Package entity.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
entity.Character
entity.enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Killable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DudeMonster
public abstract class Enemy extends Character
Represents a general enemy character in the game. This abstract class extends the Character class and defines common properties and behaviors that all enemy types share.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Constructs an Enemy instance with the specified position and size. Initializes the enemy's direction, state.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the enemy
      y - the y-coordinate of the enemy
      width - the width of the enemy
      height - the height of the enemy

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Level level, Player player)
      Updates the state of the enemy based on its behaviour, the level, and the player.
      Parameters:
      level - the current level the enemy is part of, providing access to level-specific data and mechanics
      player - the player character interacting with the enemy, used for detecting and responding to player actions

    • readyToTakeDamage

      public boolean readyToTakeDamage()
      Determines whether the enemy is ready to take damage based on its invulnerability frames status.
      Returns:
      true if the enemy is ready to take damage, false if invulnerability frames are active.
